sentence.Network_en: Then the woodcutter let his axe fly— Thwack! Everyone heard it.
sentence.Network_cn: 然后那个伐木工脱手甩出了斧头。哐！每个人都听见了。

sentence.Network_en: I listened to the thwack of the metal balls.
sentence.Network_cn: 我听着金属球相撞的声音。

sentence.Network_en: Fans are holding their breath and awaiting the thwack that will determine the victor.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有的粉丝都屏住呼吸,等待那决定性的一击.

entry.def: A thwack is a sound made when two solid objects hit each other hard.

example.ex: I listened to the thwack of the metal balls...
example.tran: 我听着金属球相撞的声音。

example.ex: Then the woodcutter let his axe fly — Thwack! Everyone heard it.
example.tran: 然后那个伐木工脱手甩出了斧头。哐！每个人都听见了。

means.word_mean: 1. a hard blow with a flat object

sentences.sentence: "The teacher smacked the student who had misbehaved"
